ygData.subject: Re: Fw: [EQMagicians] Just a thought..
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, this makes sense, but I m not a very good pet owner, I guess. Mine die all the time *g*. I figure since bone chips are free, and mana is free... who
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, this makes sense, but I'm not a very good pet owner, I guess. Mine die
all the time *g*. I figure since bone chips are free, and mana is free...
who cares? If I get a strong pet I'll take pains to keep it around, but
otherwise I figure the pet is expendable. Magicians have to buy malochite so
I can see being careful there.

I've never tried this, but could you sic your pet on a monster, run a goodly
distance away, then when your pet dies summon a second one to send after the
beast?



> Ok if you are level 6 here is a scale for you. Rank 1 is level 1
> to 4 as we
> all know. Each rank is made up of 4 levels. The first 2 levels in
> a rank you
> can take a yellow.. most times. But then the last 2 levels in a rank you
> have to be careful. Yellow's are now red for your pet. So now the third
> level in a rank a black ranking is realy yellow. then in the last
> level in a
> rank blue in some cases are realy yellow. If you dont under stand
> what I am
> saying.. Just tell me. I will try and explan this agian. The main reason
> for this is the stenth of your pet. Most necros that have a hard time is
> because they for get to look at what they are going to fight threw there
> pets eyes.
>
> There's my 2 cents.
